message: Let's start with a fair split, I'll give you 40% and take the rest. Accept and we can finish the game.
I'll give you a slightly smaller share, but I'll still give you most of the money. You can't complain too much, right?
I'm not getting any younger, Bob. I need a bigger share. Take it or leave it.
I'm not giving in, Alice. You're not getting the whole pie. I'll give you a slightly better deal, but you're still not getting the majority.
I'm getting desperate, Bob. You're not getting any younger either. Take the 90% and be done with it.
You're getting desperate, Alice? I'm not getting desperate yet. I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not giving up yet.
This is my last offer, Bob. I'm not getting any younger, and I need to eat. Take it or leave it.
You're really trying to starve me out, aren't you? I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not going to give up yet.
I'm not leaving with nothing, Bob. Take the 99.9% and be done with it.
You're really trying to humiliate me, aren't you? I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not going to roll over yet.
I'm not leaving without getting something, Bob. Take the 99.99% and be done with it.
I'm not going to give in, Alice. You're going to have to take it all.
